title: Get WAN IP
description:
GET_WAN_IP determines the IP address that the Internet router on the Wide 

Area Network (Internet) uses. This IP address is necessary for example to 

to make DynDNS declarations. With a positive edge of the ACTIVATE the 

request is started. After successful completion of the query DONE = TRUE, 

and the parameters WAN_IP the current WAN IP address displayed. If an 

error occurs during the query it is reported in ERROR_C in combination 

with ERROR_T.

ERROR_T:

Value Properties

1 The exact meaning of ERROR_C can be read at module DNS_CLIENT

2 The exact meaning of ERROR_C can be read at module HTTP_GET

97 Version 1.21

Chapter 9. Network and Communication
name: GET_WAN_IP

input.name: IP_C
input.description: Data structure for IP Control parameters.

input.name: S_BUF
input.description: Data structure for the transmit network buffer.

input.name: R_BUF
input.description: Data structure for the receive network buffer.

output.name: DONE
output.description: Indicates whether the query completed without errors.

output.name: ERROR_C
output.description: Error code associated with the query.
